data.claim: E2B MCP Server (github.com/e2b-dev/mcp-server) provides secure code sandboxing with full Linux environment. Unlike basic code execution, E2B offers: package installation, persistent environments, file system access, terminal commands, internet connectivity. Ideal for AI-generated code execution.
data.snippet: E2B sandboxes provide an ideal environment for running MCP tools, giving AI full access to an internet-connected Linux machine where it can safely install packages, write files, run terminal commands.
